bibl.title: "It would be very nice if you sent me 200 drachmas".
bibl.note: "Family letters discovered in ancient Egypt show that writing back home to Papa on papyrus was much the same then as now." Dessins humoristiques dans le style des bandes dessinées.
bibl.seg: Casson Lionel and Michael Ramus, "It would be very nice if you sent me 200 drachmas".
"Family letters discovered in ancient Egypt show that writing back home to Papa on papyrus was much the same then as now." Dessins humoristiques dans le style des bandes dessinées.
